item.title: By: Jacobs
item.dc:creator: Jacobs
item.description: I installed it on my phone and it keeps asking for wi-fi settings but I'm browsing through my phone sim
item.content:encoded: I installed it on my phone and it keeps asking for wi-fi settings but I’m browsing through my phone sim
